post.description: Creates a new customer for the authenticated account with the provided details.

400.description: Invalid input data for creating a customer

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of customers associated with the authenticated account.
Searches for customers associated with the authenticated account based on a search string that matches their name or email.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search string to filter customers by name or email

200.description: Found customers list, or empty array if none found

get.summary: Search customers by name or email

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific customer using their External Key.

parameters.name: externalKey
parameters.description: External Key of the customer to retrieve details for

get.summary: Get customer details by External Key

patch.description: Updates the details of a specific customer using their External Key and the provided update data.

parameters.name: externalKey
parameters.description: External Key of the customer to update

400.description: Invalid input data for updating customer

patch.summary: Update customer details by External Key

delete.description: Deletes a specific customer associated with the authenticated account using their External Key.

parameters.name: externalKey
parameters.description: External Key of the customer to delete

delete.summary: Delete a customer by External Key

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all payment methods associated with a specific customer.

parameters.name: externalKey
parameters.description: External Key of the customer whose payment methods are to be listed

400.description: Invalid request for listing customer payment methods

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific payment method associated with a customer.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the payment method to retrieve details for

400.description: Invalid request for retrieving customer payment method details

get.description: Retrieves a list of tax codes with their associated category names. Optionally filter by search term.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by tax codes or category names

200.description: Successfully retrieved tax codes with category names

get.summary: Get tax codes with category names

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all products for the authenticated account. Supports pagination and search functionality.

200.description: Successfully retrieved paginated list of products

post.description: Creates a new product with the specified details. The product name must be unique and follow specific naming conventions.

get.description: Retrieves details of a specific product by its unique identifier.

patch.description: Updates an existing product with the specified details. Only provided fields will be updated.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the product to update

delete.description: Permanently deletes a product. This action cannot be undone.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the product to delete

get.description: Retrieves a list of transactions for the current account, based on the authentication that was used to make the request.
Retrieves detailed information about a specific transaction for the current account, based on the authentication that was used to make the request.
Retrieves a paginated list of all invoices for the authenticated account. Supports pagination and filtering.

200.description: Successfully retrieved paginated list of invoices

post.description: Creates a new invoice for a customer. The invoice will include line items, pricing, taxes, and other billing information. The invoice will be in draft status until paid or committed.

400.description: Invalid input data or corrupted API key

get.description: Retrieves a specific invoice by its unique identifier, including all invoice details, line items, and payment information.

put.description: Pays an invoice. This action will attempt to charge the customer using the payment method on file and finalize the invoice.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the invoice to pay

400.description: Invalid or corrupted API key, or invoice cannot be paid

delete.description: Voids a draft or open invoice. A voided invoice cannot be paid and is marked as cancelled. This action is irreversible.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the invoice to void

400.description: Invalid or corrupted API key, or invoice cannot be voided

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all transactions associated with a specific invoice, including payment attempts, refunds, and adjustments.

200.description: Successfully retrieved paginated list of invoice transactions

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific transaction associated with an invoice.
Retrieves a paginated list of all tax rates for the authenticated account. Supports pagination and filtering.

200.description: Successfully retrieved paginated list of tax rates

post.description: Creates a new tax rate for the authenticated account. Tax rates define the percentage of tax to be applied to transactions.

400.description: Invalid input data or corrupted API key

get.description: Retrieves a specific tax rate by its unique identifier.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the tax rate

patch.description: Updates an existing tax rate by its unique identifier. Only the provided fields will be updated.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the tax rate to update

400.description: Invalid input data or corrupted API key

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all prices for the authenticated account. Supports pagination and search functionality.

200.description: Successfully retrieved paginated list of prices

get.description: Retrieves details of a specific price by its unique identifier.

post.description: Creates a new price for an existing product. The price can be one-time or recurring (subscription-based).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the product to add the price to

post.summary: Create a price for a product

delete.description: Permanently deletes a price. This action cannot be undone. Active prices associated with active subscriptions should be deactivated instead of deleted.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the price to delete

patch.description: Updates an inactive price with new details. Only inactive prices can be fully updated with this endpoint.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the inactive price to update

patch.description: Updates metadata of an active price. Only the description field can be modified for active prices to maintain billing consistency.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the active price to update

requestBody.description: Price metadata update data (only description can be updated for active prices)

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all subscriptions for the authenticated account. Supports pagination and filtering.

200.description: Successfully retrieved paginated list of subscriptions

post.description: Creates a new subscription for a customer. The subscription will include product items, pricing, and billing information.

400.description: Invalid input data or corrupted API key

get.description: Retrieves a specific subscription by its unique identifier.

patch.description: Updates an existing subscription by its unique identifier. Can modify items, pricing, billing information, and other subscription details.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the subscription to update

400.description: Invalid input data or corrupted API key

delete.description: Cancels an active subscription. The subscription will be terminated immediately or at the end of the current billing period based on configuration.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the subscription to cancel

post.description: Pauses an active subscription. No charges will be made while the subscription is paused. The subscription can be resumed later.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the subscription to pause

400.description: Invalid or corrupted API key, or subscription cannot be paused

post.description: Resumes a paused subscription. Billing will continue from where it was paused, and the subscription will be active again.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the subscription to resume

400.description: Invalid or corrupted API key, or subscription is not paused

get.description: Retrieves the current account balance, based on the authentication that was used to make the request.
Retrieves a list of payment methods for the current account, based on the authentication that was used to make the request.
Retrieves detailed information about a specific payment method for the current account, based on the authentication that was used to make the request.

post.description: Attaches a payment method to a customer for the current account, based on the authentication that was used to make the request.
Detaches a payment method from a customer for the current account, based on the authentication that was used to make the request.

info.title: Chaching API
info.description: Chaching is a modern subscription-billing platform designed to simplify product management, customer lifecycle workflows, and recurring payments. It combines a clean dashboard for business users with a powerful API built for developers who need full automation and control.

tags.name: Customers
tags.description: This object represents a customer of your business. Use it to create recurring charges, save payment and contact information, and track payments that belong to the same customer.

tags.name: Products
tags.description: Products describe the specific goods or services you offer to your customers. For example, you might offer a Standard and Premium version of your goods or service; each version would be a separate Product.

tags.name: Transactions
tags.description: Transactions represent the payments and charges made by your customers.

tags.name: Invoices
tags.description: Invoices are statements of amounts owed by a customer, and are either generated one-off, or generated periodically from a subscription.

tags.name: TaxRates
tags.description: TaxRates allow you to calculate the tax to collect from your customer.

tags.name: Prices
tags.description: This object represents a price in your Chaching account. Use it to define the cost of your products, configure one-time or recurring billing intervals, specify tax behavior, and manage pricing updates or deactivations for your offerings.

tags.name: Subscriptions
tags.description: Subscriptions are a way to charge your customers on a recurring basis. They can be used for products or services that are delivered over time, such as memberships or software licenses.

tags.name: Balance
tags.description: Balances represent the amount of money in your account. You can use balances to track your income and expenses, and to make payments to your customers or vendors.

tags.name: Payment Methods
tags.description: Payment Methods represent a way to collect payment from your customers. They can be attached to customers to make charging easier and more efficient.

city.description: City, district, suburb, town, or village.

line1.description: Address line 1(e.g., street, PO Box, or company name).

line2.description: Address line 2(e.g., apartment, suite, unit, or building).

phone.description: The phone number of the recipient.

name.description: The full name or business name of the customer.

description.description: An arbitrary string attached to the object. Often useful for displaying to users.

shipping.description: The customer’s shipping information. Appears on invoices emailed to this customer.

name.description: The full name or business name of the customer.

description.description: An arbitrary string attached to the object. Often useful for displaying to users.

created.description: Time at which the object was created. Measured in seconds since the Unix epoch.

shipping.description: The customer’s shipping information. Appears on invoices emailed to this customer.

line1.description: Street line 1 of the billing address.

line2.description: Street line 2 of the billing address.

address.description: Billing address associated with the payment method.

name.description: Full name of the account owner.

supported.description: List of supported bank transfer networks.

financial_connections_account.description: Financial connections account reference if available.

fingerprint.description: Stripe fingerprint identifying the bank account.

last4.description: Last 4 digits of the bank account.

networks.description: Supported and preferred bank transfer networks.

id.description: Unique identifier for the payment method.

allow_redisplay.description: Controls whether the payment method can be redisplayed.

billing_details.description: Billing details associated with the payment method.

created.description: Unix timestamp when the payment method was created.

customer.description: ID of the attached customer, if any.

livemode.description: Indicates if the object exists in live mode.

metadata.description: Set of key-value pairs for storing additional information.

us_bank_account.description: US bank account details if the payment method is a bank account.

active.description: Indicates whether the object is active.

created.description: Time at which the object was created. Measured in seconds since the Unix epoch

default_price.description: The ID of the Price object that is the default price for this product.

tax_code.description: The tax code for the product.

updated.description: Time at which the object was last updated. Measured in seconds since the Unix epoch.

tax_code.description: The tax category for this product
The tax category for this product

amount.description: Gross amount of this transaction (in cents).

payment_method.description: ID of the payment method used in this transaction.

balance_type.description: The balance type of the transaction.

available_on.description: The date that the transaction’s net funds become available in the Stripe balance.

created.description: The date the transaction was created.

exchange_rate.description: The exchange rate applied to this transaction.

fee.description: The fee applied to this transaction (in cents).

fee_details.description: Detailed breakdown of fees (in cents) paid for this transaction.

net.description: The net amount of this transaction (in cents).

finalized_at.description: Timestamp when the invoice was marked as finalized.

paid_at.description: Timestamp when the invoice was marked as paid.

voided_at.description: Timestamp when the invoice was marked as voided.

amount.description: The amount of the tax, in cents.

tax_behavior.description: Whether this tax is inclusive or exclusive.

taxable_amount.description: The amount on which tax is calculated.

account_country.description: Country of the account associated with the invoice (only US is supported).

account_name.description: Name of the account associated with the invoice.

amount_due.description: Final amount due at this time for this invoice (in cents for USD).

amount_paid.description: The amount, in cents, that was paid.

amount_remaining.description: The difference between amount_due and amount_paid, in cents.

attempt_count.description: Number of payment attempts made for this invoice.

attempted.description: Whether payment of this invoice was attempted.

billing_reason.description: Describes why this invoice was created.

created.description: Time at which the object was created. Measured in seconds since the Unix epoch

currency.description: Three-letter ISO currency code, in uppercase

customer.description: ID of the customer associated with this invoice.

customer_email.description: Email of the customer associated with the invoice.

customer_name.description: Name of the customer associated with the invoice.

lines.description: The individual line items that make up the invoice.

number.description: A unique, identifying string that appears on emails sent to the customer for this invoice.

paid.description: Whether payment was successfully collected for this invoice.

period_end.description: End of the usage period during which invoice items were added to this invoice.

period_start.description: Start of the usage period during which invoice items were added to this invoice.

status.description: The status of the invoice, one of draft, open, paid, or void.

status_transitions.description: The timestamps at which the invoice status was updated.

subscription.description: The ID of the subscription that this invoice was prepared for, if any.

subtotal.description: Total of all subscriptions, invoice items, and prorations on the invoice before any invoice level discount or exclusive tax is applied

subtotal_excluding_tax.description: The integer amount in cents representing the subtotal of the invoice before any invoice level discount or tax is applied

tax.description: The amount of tax on this invoice.

total_excluding_tax.description: The integer amount in cents representing the total amount of the invoice including all discounts but excluding all tax.

total_taxes.description: The aggregate amounts calculated per tax rate for all line items.

price.description: The price ID in friendly ID format.

tax.description: Array of tax IDs in friendly ID format.

collection_method.description: The collection method for this invoice.

customer.description: The ID of the customer for whom the invoice is to be created.

due_date.description: The date on which payment for this invoice is due. Valid only for invoices where collection_method=send_invoice.

default_payment_method.description: The default payment method to be used for this invoice. Valid only for invoices where collection_method=charge_automatically.

items.description: Array of products to be included in the invoice.

active.description: Indicates whether the object is active.

country.description: Two-letter ISO country code representing the country for the tax rate (only US is supported)

created.description: Timestamp (in seconds since Unix epoch) of when the object was created.

description.description: An arbitrary string attached to the object. Often useful for displaying to users.

display_name.description: The display name of the tax rate, e.g., "Sales Tax".

inclusive.description: Specifies if the tax is inclusive (included in price) or exclusive (added on top).

percentage.description: The tax percentage rate, e.g., 7.25 for 7.25%.

display_name.description: Display name for the tax rate. Required when tax_type is Custom

percentage.description: The tax percentage rate, e.g., 7.25 for 7.25%.

inclusive.description: Whether this tax rate is inclusive or exclusive

display_name.description: Display name for the tax rate. Required when tax_type is Custom

active.description: Indicates whether the object is active.

created.description: Time at which the object was created. Measured in seconds since the Unix epoch

currency.description: Three-letter ISO currency code, in uppercase

product.description: ID of the product this price is associated with

recurring.description: The recurring components of a price such as interval and interval_count. Null if the price is not recurring.

tax_behavior.description: The tax behavior of the product.

type.description: One of one_time or recurring depending on whether the price is for a one-time purchase or a recurring (subscription) purchase.

unit_amount.description: The unit amount in cents to be charged, represented as a whole integer if possible.

link.description: Payment link associated with the price for hosted pages or other off-session payments.

total_count.description: The total number of subscription items.

billing_cycle_anchor.description: Determines the date of the first full invoice, and, for plans with month or year intervals, the day of the month for subsequent invoices.

cancel_at.description: A date in the future at which the subscription will automatically get canceled.

cancel_at_period_end.description: Whether this subscription will (if status=active) or did (if status=canceled) cancel at the end of the current billing period.

canceled_at.description: If the subscription has been canceled, the date of that cancellation.

created.description: Time at which the object was created. Measured in seconds since the Unix epoch.

currency.description: Three-letter ISO currency code, in uppercase.

customer.description: ID of the customer who owns the subscription.

ended_at.description: If the subscription has ended, the date the subscription ended.

items.description: List of subscription items, each with an attached plan.

latest_invoice.description: The most recent invoice this subscription has generated.

start_date.description: Date when the subscription was first created.

trial_end.description: If the subscription has a trial, the end of that trial.

trial_start.description: If the subscription has a trial, the beginning of that trial.

customer.description: The ID of the customer for whom the invoice is to be created.

items.description: Array of products to be included in the subscription.

trial_days.description: The number of trial days for the subscription.

start_date.description: The day when subscription starts. The `start_date` must be a valid Unix timestamp (positive number) in seconds

end_date.description: The day when subscription ends. The `end_date` must be a valid Unix timestamp (positive number) in seconds

start_billing_date.description: The day when subscription starts billing. The `start_billing_date` must be a valid Unix timestamp (positive number) in seconds

customer.description: The ID of the customer for whom the invoice is to be created.

items.description: Array of products to be included in the subscription.

trial_days.description: The number of trial days for the subscription.

end_date.description: The day when subscription ends. The `end_date` must be a valid Unix timestamp (positive number) in seconds

card.description: Total amount coming from card payments.

bank_account.description: Total amount coming from legacy US ACH payments.

fpx.description: Total amount coming from FPX payments.

amount.description: Amount of funds available or pending in this currency.

source_types.description: Breakdown of the balance by payment source type.

amount.description: Amount of prefunding for this currency.

available.description: List of available prefunded balances for refunds and disputes.

pending.description: List of pending prefunded balances for refunds and disputes.

object.description: Type of object returned by Stripe.

available.description: List of balances available for payout.

pending.description: List of pending (not yet available) balance amounts.

livemode.description: Indicates whether the balance belongs to a live (production) account.

refund_and_dispute_prefunding.description: Details about prefunded amounts for refunds and disputes.

customerId.description: ID of the customer to attach the payment method to
